name: Boolean
description:
Everything is either ON or OFF.

Boolean is an open-ended problem solving game where you build circuits and send signals. You place tiles whom follow the laws of boolean logic and make interesting devices! Puzzles range from easy to extreme, and will take you through the development of complex circuits used in computers today.

FEATURES:
  • Build circuits using 10+ different tiles.
  • Solve 18 unique open-ended puzzles based on real life problems, all with 2 savefiles each.
  • Create whatever you want in the sandbox mode, complete with as many savefiles as you want.
  • Save selections of circuits using the Component system.
  • Move, delete and duplicate selections of tiles.
  • An undo system.
  • Original soundtrack.
  • Simple options.

Go ahead and try Boolean! Learn about Boolean logic, Logic gates, Binary and much more! Be creative and design typewriters, minigames, calculators, ALUs or even simple computers!
